string-array.name: messages
string-array.item: Checking your account balance has never been this easy. Simply open the MyApp.
Earn Rewards Points by purchasing offers, and redeem your Points to buy special packs.
Get notified about all our latest offerings right from MyApp. Buying is just a few easy steps.
Get in touch with our customer managers anytime for support and assistance with your GP connection.
What are your passions? You personalize it by using the features you love the most!
